about_the_game:
Dig your way through procedurally generated caves filled with valuable minerals. Collect ores, gems, and rare treasures as you build up your resources. Use them to upgrade your mole’s abilities, craft powerful tools, and gain an edge over your rivals. The deeper you dig, the better the loot!

The underground world is filled with rival moles who will stop at nothing to take you down. Fight for dominance by using clever tactics, combat skills, and explosive surprises. Whether in a heated battle or a strategic showdown, the fight for supremacy is on—are you ready to emerge victorious?

Dig deep and rise to the top in Mineral Madness! As a mighty mole, you're on a quest to claim your title as the top mole in a world full of dangerous rivals. Hone your digging skills, gather precious resources, and fight off competitors to become the ultimate underground champion. Can you dig your way to victory?

Prepare for intense, fast-paced multiplayer action! Team up with friends or face off against foes in chaotic, mineral-filled arenas. The cave is a dangerous place, and only the smartest and toughest moles survive. Will you conquer your enemies, or will they leave you in the dust?

No two adventures are ever the same! The caves in Mineral Madness are procedurally generated, offering fresh and unique challenges each time you dig down. Explore endless tunnels, navigate unpredictable terrain, and discover hidden treasures in caves that are as diverse as they are dangerous.

Customize your mole with a wide variety of zany loadouts! From explosive drills to jetpacks and unique power-ups, Mineral Madness lets you equip your mole with all kinds of outlandish tools and gadgets. Mix and match to create the most outrageous, powerful, and fun loadouts possible.

name: Mineral Madness
short_description: Mineral Madness is a fast-paced battle arena where you go head-to-head against rival moles as you race to collect the most minerals. Create mayhem as you blast your way through the fully destructible underground to become the number one mole miner!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
